page.title: 03Methodism in Misterton
page.content: {Methodist Church}_ High Street {Manse}_ 'Harleigh',64 Station St. {Minister}_ Rev. Renee Howling,who also has pastoral oversight of nearby Walkeringham,Beckingham,West Stockwith and Gringley. {Membership number}_ 126 {Average attendance}_ 30 {Assessment}(to be paid to the Gainsborough Circuit) _Â£5,640 p.a. {Services}_ Sundays at 10.30 a.m. and 6 p.m. during the summer months and 2.30 p.m. and 6 p.m. during winter time. {Sunday School}_10.30 a.m. {Womens Fellowship}_ every Wednesday The Church has schoolrooms,a kitchen, toilets, and a hall. {Activities}_ Teens and Young adults, Clinic,Ladies choir,Keep Fit class, Birthday parties,Social concerts, Dinners, etc.
